import Head from 'next/head' import styles from '../styles/BlogLayout.module.sass' import Link from 'next/link' import Navigation from './Navigation.js' import ChangeBackground from './ChangeBackground' import Image from 'next/image' import Footer from 'Footer' export default function BlogLayout({ children, siteTitle, postDescription, postImage }) { return (
{siteTitle + "| Sebastian Jagla"}
Back to home

{siteTitle}

{postDescription}

{children}
) }
